DOC.brief_summary: This randomize control trial ( RCT ) evaluate effectiveness Questscope Non-Formal Education ( QS NFE ) impact psychosocial outcome out-of-school youth , age 13-21 , Jordan . QS NFE empowerment-based education program . A unique agreement Jordanian Ministry Education enable participate youth receive 10th-grade equivalent certificate upon successful completion 24-month non-formal education . The main component QS NFE include retrain formal education teacher foster positive relationship at-risk youth , asset-building learn social activity , youth-driven learn environment . The study hypothesis engage youth positive relationship local teacher enable youth drive learn experience , intervention positive impact general self-efficacy , social support , social skill , strengths difficulty .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize control trial ( RCT ) evaluate effectiveness Questscope Non-Formal Education ( QS NFE ) impact psychosocial outcome out-of-school youth , age 13-21 , Jordan . QS NFE empowerment-based education program . A unique agreement Jordanian Ministry Education enable participate youth receive 10th-grade equivalent certificate upon successful completion 24-month non-formal education . The main component QS NFE include retrain formal education teacher foster positive relationship at-risk youth , asset-building learn social activity , youth-driven learn environment . The study hypothesis engage youth positive relationship local teacher enable youth drive learn experience , intervention positive impact general self-efficacy , social support , social skill , strengths difficulty . Youth recruit accord normal Questscope recruitment procedure program leader five poverty pocket community Amman , Jordan . Six QS NFE center involve impact evaluation ( four male center 2 female center ) . Youth recruit , enrol , randomize individual basis NFE center 's sample target meet ( 24 40 youth , depend center ) . The overall sample target 200 six NFE center aggregately ( 100 intervention group 100 waitlist comparison ) . The study aim recruit 54 female 146 male . Randomization conduct electronically use random permute block method SealedEnvelope.com . Data collection outcome measure involve computer-based , self-administered questionnaire design The Survey System software Creative Research Systems . The computer-based survey provide text audio accommodate low literacy level . In event participant reject his/her random assignment within 48 hour enrollment , youth replace study include final data analysis . Additionally , sibling recruit together study block randomize together enrollment .
